```{r}

res_13721 <- GET("https://archerapi.clinecenter.illinois.edu/select?q=content:(Algeria%20AND%20(civil%20war%20OR%20internal%20conflict%20OR%20civil%20conflict))&fl=aid,title,source_name&fq=source_name:BulkLexisNexis%20OR%20BulkLexisNexis_v2&wt=json&key=f0b1137a-2b2b-4252-bcaf-9436d1f4b01e")
```

```{r}
#return json file
res_13721 
http_type(res_13721)

```

```{r}

parsed <- jsonlite::fromJSON(content(res_13721, "text"), simplifyVector = FALSE)
parsed
#why only shows 10?
```

```{r}

test <- structure(
    list(
      content = parsed,
      response = res_13721
    ))
    
test[[1]]
```
